scripts.build:abstract:watch: npm run -r $CMD; while inotifywait -r -e create -e modify -e move -e delete .; do npm run -r $CMD; done
scripts.build:CD: ZIP_PACK=prod.zip ./build.sh && DEBUG=on ZIP_PACK=dbg.zip ./build.sh && npm run -s build:clean && unzip prod.zip -d public && unzip dbg.zip -d public/debug && rm *.zip
scripts.build:clean: echo -n '>> Remove build dirs... ' && (! test -e dist || rm -r dist) && (! test -e public || rm -r public) && echo Done.
